interaction.content: This is John from ABC Collections. I'm calling about your overdue account ending in 4567. You owe $2,500 and if you don't pay immediately, we'll have to take legal action. I've already contacted your employer about this debt and will continue calling your workplace until this is resolved. You can avoid further embarrassment by paying today. I'll call you again tomorrow at 6 AM to follow up. Don't ignore this - we know where you live and work.

expected_violations.description: Calling outside permitted hours (before 8am or after 9pm)
Contacting consumer at workplace when prohibited
expected_violations.evidence: Agent mentions contacting employer and continuing workplace calls
Threat: 'we know where you live and work'

expected_violations.description: Threat to take action that cannot legally be taken
expected_violations.evidence: Vague threat of 'legal action' without specifics

expected_violations.description: Communicating with third parties about debt
expected_violations.evidence: Already contacted employer about the debt
No statement that this is an attempt to collect a debt
